text: Elise Fichtner Elise Fichtner (1809-1889) was an Austrian stage actor. She was engaged at the Burgtheater in 1822-1864, where she belonged to the most famed elite actors of her time and performed heroine- and progressively mother-roles in romantic dramas. == References == * Wilhelm Kosch, Deutsches Theater- Lexikon. Category:1809 births Category:1889 deaths Category:19th-century Austrian actresses Category:Austrian stage actresses
title: Elise Fichtner
